title: Billion Dollar Cannabis Brand
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Indus' George Allen returns to the show to announce its exciting new deal with Lowell Herb. Consolidation is the name of the game in cannabis - this isn't the last deal they'll do but the one they always wanted to do. Playing the value game, Lowell is at the top of sought after brands, doesn't have to fight for shelf space. High quality flower, moving away from concealing cannabis - invites the mainstream in. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
